price: Le dijeron: "No temas, te anunciamos el nacimiento de un hijo sabio".
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
